name: Aviator Zone Academy
about: Aviator Zone Academy, located at the Miami Executive Airport, is a premier flight training provider in Miami and Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Founded by Felipe Santiago, who began his aviation journey at 12, the academy is dedicated to training top-notch pilots through personalized, one-on-one instruction. Offering both Part 61 and Part 141 flight training, Aviator Zone provides structured yet flexible programs that mirror airline training standards, catering to both career-oriented pilots and those flying for recreation. With a fleet of seven flight training aircraft and a team of experienced instructors, the academy has been recognized as the 2021 AOPA Flight Training Experience Survey Southern regional award winner. Aviator Zone is committed to delivering high-quality, affordable training in a welcoming and professional environment. Join us to experience the difference in flight training.
